list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a feeling of reassurance and relaxation following release from anxiety or distress.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: much to her relief, she saw the door open
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhiều để cứu trợ cô, cô nhìn thấy cánh cửa mở

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assistance, especially in the form of food, clothing, or money, given to those in special need or difficulty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tăng tiền cho cứu trợ nạn đói

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person or group of people replacing others who have been on duty.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: y tá cứu trợ đã muộn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the state of being clearly visible or obvious due to being accentuated in some way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the setting sun threw the snow-covered peaks into relief
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mặt trời lặn ném những đỉnh núi phủ tuyết vào cứu trợ
